titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 334) to provide for the recognition of the Lumbee Tribe of Cheraw Indians of North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-309, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 334 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with clause 2(l)(2)(B) of rule XI are waived. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 106.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/27/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 334 (providing for the recognition of the Lumbee Tribe of Cheraw Indians of North Carolina).
